snippet: Craig Biggio said he might have been bypassed for the Hall of Fame because he was on the ballot for the first time with several stars linked to performance-enhancing drugs
abstract: Former Major League Baseball player Craig Biggio says he may have been bypassed for Baseball Hall of Fame because he was on ballot for first time with several stars linked to performance-enhancing drugs.
lead_paragraph: Craig Biggio said he might have been bypassed for the Hall of Fame because he was on the ballot for the first time with several stars linked to performance-enhancing drugs

headline.seo: Craig Biggio Cites Drug Issue in Hall of Fame Vote
headline.main: Biggio Cites Drug Issue in Hall Vote
headline.print_headline: Biggio Cites Drug Issue in Hall Vote
